sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY APPLY_ID DESC ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT A.APPLY_ID,B.APPLY_DETAIL_ID ,B.PRIOVINCE,B.CITY,B.RES_TYPE_ID,C.RES_TYPE_NAME,C.APPLY_TYPE_ID,B.AMOUNT,A.APPLY_DATE,A.DESCRIPTOR,A.STATE,B.NUMBER_SEGMENT,F.RES_TYPE_NAME FRES_TYPE_NAME,B.RESULT_AMOUNT,A.AUDIT_DESCRIPTOR ,A.RES_FILE_NAME , (SELECT D.ZONE_NAME FROM AREA D WHERE B.PRIOVINCE = D.AREA_ID) AREA_PROVINCE, (SELECT T.ZONE_NAME FROM AREA T WHERE B.CITY = T.AREA_ID) AREA_CITY FROM APPLY_INFO A,APPLY_INFO_DETAIL B,APPLY_RESOURCE_TYPE C , APPLY_RESOURCE_TYPE F ,ORG O WHERE A.APPLY_ID = B.APPLY_ID AND B.RES_TYPE_ID = C.RES_TYPE_ID AND F.RES_TYPE_ID = B.RESULT_RES_TYPE_ID AND O.ORG_ID = A.ORG_ID AND A.tenant_id=B.tenant_id AND B.tenant_id=C.tenant_id AND C.tenant_id=F.tenant_id
O.ORG_ID=#orgId# A.STATE=#state# A.APPLY_TYPE_ID=#applyTypeId# B.PRIOVINCE=#priovince# B.CITY=#city# TO_CHAR(A.APPLY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #beginTime# TO_CHAR(A.APPLY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #endTime#
B.RES_TYPE_ID=#resTypeId# A.tenant_id=#tenantId#
) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM APPLY_INFO A,APPLY_INFO_DETAIL B,APPLY_RESOURCE_TYPE C , APPLY_RESOURCE_TYPE F ,ORG O WHERE A.APPLY_ID = B.APPLY_ID AND B.RES_TYPE_ID = C.RES_TYPE_ID AND F.RES_TYPE_ID = B.RESULT_RES_TYPE_ID AND O.ORG_ID = A.ORG_ID
O.ORG_ID=#orgId# A.STATE=#state# A.APPLY_TYPE_ID=#applyTypeId# B.PRIOVINCE=#priovince# B.CITY=#city# TO_CHAR(A.APPLY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #beginTime# TO_CHAR(A.APPLY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #endTime# B.RES_TYPE_ID=#resTypeId# A.tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY APPLY_ID DESC ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT A.APPLY_ID,B.PRIOVINCE,B.CITY,B.RES_TYPE_ID,C.RES_TYPE_NAME,B.AMOUNT,A.APPLY_DATE,A.DESCRIPTOR,D.CYCLE_NAME,A.STATE, (SELECT D.ZONE_NAME FROM AREA D WHERE B.PRIOVINCE = D.AREA_ID) AREA_PROVINCE, (SELECT T.ZONE_NAME FROM AREA T WHERE B.CITY = T.AREA_ID) AREA_CITY FROM APPLY_INFO A,APPLY_INFO_DETAIL B,APPLY_RESOURCE_TYPE C,APPLY_CYCLE D WHERE A.APPLY_ID = B.APPLY_ID AND B.RES_TYPE_ID = C.RES_TYPE_ID AND A.CYCLE_ID = D.CYCLE_ID
A.STATE=#state# A.APPLY_TYPE_ID=#applyTypeId# B.PRIOVINCE=#priovince# B.CITY=#city# TO_CHAR(A.APPLY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #beginTime# TO_CHAR(A.APPLY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #endTime#
B.RES_TYPE_ID=#resTypeId# A.tenant_id=#tenantId# B.tenant_id=#tenantId# C.tenant_id=#tenantId# D.tenant_id=#tenantId#
) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM APPLY_INFO A,APPLY_INFO_DETAIL B,APPLY_RESOURCE_TYPE C,APPLY_CYCLE D WHERE A.APPLY_ID = B.APPLY_ID AND B.RES_TYPE_ID = C.RES_TYPE_ID AND A.CYCLE_ID = D.CYCLE_ID
A.STATE=#state# A.APPLY_TYPE_ID=#applyTypeId# B.PRIOVINCE=#priovince# B.CITY=#city# TO_CHAR(A.APPLY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #beginTime# TO_CHAR(A.APPLY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #endTime# B.RES_TYPE_ID=#resTypeId# A.tenant_id=#tenantId# B.tenant_id=#tenantId# C.tenant_id=#tenantId# D.tenant_id=#tenantId#

select b.apply_detail_id applyDetailId, b.amount amount, b.result_amount resultAmount,b.res_type_id resTypeId ,b.result_res_type_id resultResTypeId from apply_info a , apply_info_detail b where a.apply_id = b.apply_id
a.APPLY_ID=#applyId# A.tenant_id=#tenantId# B.tenant_id=#tenantId# C.tenant_id=#tenantId# D.tenant_id=#tenantId#
